levels.description: After deployment, the Operator in the tile ahead gains <@ba.vup>+2</> Tactical Equipment stack limit (max 5), and will gain an additional <@ba.vup>+4</> Transfer Permits for every enemy defeated; while the device is active, Relieving will not retreat that Operator, but rather give them the appropriate Tactical Equipment; while using this EC Unit, Tactical Equipment that triggers on deployment will not take effect
